template.name: sql
template.content:
<#assign uuid = "${ClassName?lower_case}"> <#assign len = uuid?length/> <#list len..29 as aa> <#assign uuid = uuid + "0"> </#list> <#-- 表菜单 --> insert into sys_menu (ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, NAME, SORT, HREF, TARGET, ICON, IS_SHOW, PERMISSION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values ('${uuid}00', '1', '0,1,', '${functionName}', 900, '/${urlPrefix}', null, null, '1', null, '1', '10-4月 -17 ', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', null, '0');
<#-- 查看 --> insert into sys_menu (ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, NAME, SORT, HREF, TARGET, ICON, IS_SHOW, PERMISSION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values ('${uuid}01', '${uuid}00', '0,1,${uuid}00,', '查看 ', 10, null, null, null, '0', '${permissionPrefix}:view', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', null, '0');
<#-- 编辑 --> insert into sys_menu (ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, NAME, SORT, HREF, TARGET, ICON, IS_SHOW, PERMISSION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values ('${uuid}02', '${uuid}00', '0,1,${uuid}00,', '编辑', 20, null, null, null, '0', '${permissionPrefix}:edit', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', null, '0');
<#-- 导入 --> insert into sys_menu (ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, NAME, SORT, HREF, TARGET, ICON, IS_SHOW, PERMISSION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values ('${uuid}03', '${uuid}00', '0,1,${uuid}00,', '导入', 30, null, null, null, '0', '${permissionPrefix}:import', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', null, '0');
<#-- 导出 --> insert into sys_menu (ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_IDS, NAME, SORT, HREF, TARGET, ICON, IS_SHOW, PERMISSION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values ('${uuid}04', '${uuid}00', '0,1,${uuid}00,', '导出', 40, null, null, null, '0', '${permissionPrefix}:export', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', '1', '10-4月 -17 ', null, '0');
commit;
